MetaData.MetaDataItem: Features - Adopt Z-Wave protocol to secure the success of wireless two way communication - Higher RF output power (+2.5dBm output power as compared to -2.5dBm 300 series Z-wave module) to enhance the communication range - Easy install - Very low electricity consumption, meet Europe year 2012 energy-related products requirement directive 2009/125/EC no. 1275/2008 - Resistive load 3000W, 1500W for incandescent load or 320W for fluorescent load - Overload protection - Voltage, Current, Power factor, Instant power Wattage and Accumulated power consumption KWh report - Z-Wave V6.02 - Z-Wave Certificated - LVD: EN 61058 - R&TTE : EN 301489, EN 300200,

ChangeLog.Entry: Initial Metadata Import from Z-Wave Alliance Database - https://products.z-wavealliance.org/products/785/xml

Value.label: Watt meter report period
Value.Help: If the setting is configured for 1 hour (value=720), the TZ88 will report its instant power consumption every 1 hour.

Value.label: kWh meter report period
Value.Help: If the setting is configured for 1 hour (value=6), the TZ88 will report its accumulated power consumption (kWh) every 1 hour.
